duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive pre- and post-operative nursing care to patients and their families in an acute care setting.
Collaborate with multidisciplinary health care teams to maintain professional nursing practices and collect comprehensive data on patients' health.
Ensure physician orders are carried out appropriately and timely; participate in performance improvement activities to improve patient safety and quality of care.
Maintain sensitivity and awareness of cultural and religious diversity when addressing patients, visitors, co-workers, and other customers.
Promote a supportive and team-oriented environment; support departmental responsibilities consistent with the hospital's long-range strategic plan, mission, vision, and values.

education_certification.credential: BSN from an accredited school of nursing required. NYS RN license and registration required. BLS and ACLS certification required.
